Package enamel

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioPlayer
    This class simulates the hardware for a device with physical Braille cells and programmable buttons, but using audio feedback instead of a GUI to read out the cells, and keyboard keys to simulate the buttons.
    BrailleCell
    This class implements a Braille Cell with 8 pins.
    BrailleCellPanel  
    Player
    This class provides abstract and concrete methods for simulating a braille cell.
    SCALP
    This class allows the user to select a scenario file to be used for ScenarioParser to parse and play the text and commands.
    ScenarioParser  
    TactilePlayer
    This class controls the hardware for a Raspberry Pi with physical Braille cells (Using "Metec B11 Braille Cell") and programmable buttons, using the Pi4J library.
    ToyAuthoring  
    VisualPlayer
    This class simulates the hardware for a device with physical Braille cells and programmable buttons.
